title: My First Love
overview: Shin Woo is living life full of regrets as he did not have the courage to confess to his first love ten years ago. Given a chance to win her heart back by travelling back in time with the knowledge that she likes him too. Unfortunately he did not expect that he has to battle himself (from ten years ago) to win her heart, which results in a fierce rivalry amongst each other to win their love's heart.
